article.title: First-order definability of rational integers in a class of polynomial rings

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the formula Ïˆ(f, s) define in the context of the article?
choices: The set of all elements in a ring S.
The set of prime elements in a ring S.
The set of logical powers of an element s in a ring S.
The set of nilpotent elements in a ring S.

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of the element wn(p) in the article?
choices: To define the set of units in a ring S.
To define the set of nilpotent elements in a ring S.
To relate exponents of powers with divisibility properties in a ring S.
To express the characteristic of a ring S.
